channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Fly-tipping of 2 mattresses and other bedroom furniture, 15th December
item.description:
Fly-tipping on street of 2 mattresses and other bedroom furniture. Makes the street look an eye-sore.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Warwick Road, New Southgate, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tiger Way rubbish bins, 15th December
item.description:
Bind on to get way have been left like this for 5 days. Bind are full and blocking the way

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Monro Way, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Leaves everywhere on pavement. Slippy and dangerous after rainfall, 15th December
item.description:
Leaves have been littering the pavement on Tremaine road near Croydon Road end for weeks now. There is also various bits of rubbish from bin collection days littering the pavement too. Please can the council arrange for a road sweeper to address the situation asap? Thank you.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tremaine Road, Anerley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Rubbiah, 15th December
item.description:
Rubbish is regularly being left on the street on gliddon drive

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Downs Lane, Hackney, London

item.title: Abandoned car with broken window, 15th December
item.description:
Been outside for weeks. Not being used or moved. Taking up parking spaces. Should be impounded?

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Brooksbys Walk, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipped rubbish, 15th December
item.description:
Noticed this evening but could have been dumped Sunday night or daytime Monday. Partial postcode, road and name visible on one item. Appears to be household or commercial rubbish

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Tilt Yard Approach, Eltham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive bin waste and litter debris, 15th December
item.description:
The households on this street leave garbage here and once collected by bin men accumulate left over waste every week

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Springfield, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on street, 15th December
item.description:
This is a weekly occurrence. Almost every day furniture is discarded here

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Springfield, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Road surface defect, 15th December
item.description:
Not sure what has happened to cause this but there is a rectangular area the size of a manhole cover with a different surface to the rest of the road & one corner of it is eroded to create a pothole, needs repair please.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, The Crescent, Park Langley, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pedestrian traffic light going green every minute, 15th December
item.description:
No immediate safety concern. This traffic light goes green every 30 seconds to one minute even without its button having been pressed. As far as I’m aware it’s been like this for weeks. With the unprecedented congestion on Graham Road this is not helping the flow. Please get it sorted. Thanks!

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 216, Graham Road, Hackney, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing bins, 15th December
item.description:
All bins overflowing

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 12, Red Post Hill, Dulwich Village, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter on planter on Tabard Street, 15th December
item.description:
There are empty cans, food packaging and plastic left in the planter on Tabard street. Fixmystreet says it has been removed, but it is still there

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Pilgrimage Street, The Borough, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Excessive Rubbish Left on Street, 15th December
item.description:
My neighbour at 12A Mabley Street recently moved in and since day 1 has been leaving piles and piles of rubbish outside their house. There has been no effort to organise and clear the rubbish for collection and the bin men have not taken it.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Mabley Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Litter on Tabard street, 15th December
item.description:
There are plastic bottles, plastic bags, food packaging and cans on the road and pavement on Tabard Street. It has been there for three days.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 165, Great Dover Street, The Borough, Greater London

Blocking pavement

item.title: I0 inch pot hole outside 16 Martens Avenue, 15th December
item.description:
This pot hole is a regular issue. It’s been poorly patched up before and it’s back again. Might be worth a full road width resurface job. The noise and vibration of heavy cars and vans reaches the houses.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Leysdown Avenue, Barnehurst, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken camera for main door, 15th December
item.description:
The camera for the buzzer for the main door of the flat (1-8) is damaged. The camera is fallen off which makes it hard to see who is in front of the camera when answering someone buzzing in
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Great Dover Street, The Borough, Greater London
